Articles.Content: I built a ship in the VAB and want to transfer it to the SPH but I don't know where to find my ship in KSP's files. I can only find the stock builds in the VAB and SPH folders. Does anyone know where my ships are located?

they are saved under each save game individually,

each save has its own ships folder
Your KSP folder, saves, whatever your savegame is called, and Ships. Easy as that
